about_the_game:
Step into the shattered remnants of a future where humanity’s legacy has all but vanished. In Year 2134: New Era Apocalyptique, experience a gripping sci-fi adventure set in a world now ruled by robots. This captivating story-driven game immerses you in a narrative where survival is only the beginning.

Explore a Futuristic World:
The year is 2134, and the Earth has been transformed into a domain of machines. Venture through diverse, beautifully crafted locations that showcase both the grandeur and decay of a world left in robotic control. Each environment is a piece of history, revealing secrets about the collapse of human civilization.

Uncover the Truth Behind Humanity’s Disappearance:
As you navigate through this dystopian landscape, interact with your surroundings to piece together the story of how humans vanished and what led to the rise of the robots. Your journey will uncover hidden truths, raising questions about whether this new world was shaped by a rogue AI or by other, more enigmatic forces.

Solve Puzzles and Overcome Challenges:
Engage with unique puzzles that challenge your wits and adaptability. Each puzzle is intricately designed to test your problem-solving skills and push the boundaries of your adventure, making every discovery and breakthrough all the more rewarding.

Make Crucial Decisions:
Every choice you make impacts the unfolding story. Your decisions will shape your interactions with the robots and influence the outcome of your quest. Navigate moral dilemmas and plot-driving choices that determine the fate of what remains of humanity’s legacy.

Immerse Yourself in Stunning Visuals and Atmospheric Music:
The game’s striking visual design and evocative soundtrack create an immersive experience that draws you deeper into its world. The music and environments work in harmony to set the mood, enhancing every moment of your exploration and discovery.

Join the Adventure Today:
Dive into Year 2134: New Era Apocalyptique and uncover the mysteries of a world where humanity’s existence is nothing more than a memory. Add to Wishlist and become part of a story where every decision matters and every discovery counts.

Are you ready to unravel the secrets of a future beyond our own? Start your adventure today!
